articles.title: Jared Isaacman confirmed as next head of NASA
articles.description: Isaacman will run the space agency at a time when Trump is trying to both downsize it and task it with returning astronauts to the moon.
articles.author: Sean O'Kane

articles.title: YouTube to pull music data from Billboard’s charts because it doesn’t like its ranking formula
articles.description: YouTube takes its ball and goes home by pulling Billboard's access to its music data.
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: YouTube will stream the Oscars — exclusively — beginning in 2029
articles.description: The news highlights YouTube's growing dominance in the television space and a major shift as streaming takes on more live events.
articles.author: Aisha Malik

articles.title: Meta is pausing its dream of sharing Quest’s Horizon OS with third-party headset makers
articles.description: The company said that it would revisit opportunities for third-party partnerships in the future.
articles.author: Lucas Ropek

articles.title: Cisco says Chinese hackers are exploiting its customers with a new zero-day
articles.description: Cisco said it discovered a Chinese hacking campaign targeting its customers by exploiting a zero-day in some of the company's most popular products.
articles.author: Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai

articles.title: Facebook is testing a link-posting limit for professional accounts and pages
articles.description: Meta said that the test impacts professional accounts and pages on Facebook.
articles.author: Ivan Mehta

articles.title: Amazon appoints longtime AWS exec Peter DeSantis to lead new AI org
articles.description: DeSantis has spent 27 years at Amazon, including eight years as an SVP for AWS, the cloud provider that powers about one-third of the internet.
articles.author: Amanda Silberling

articles.title: Rad Power Bikes files for bankruptcy and is looking to sell the business
articles.description: It's the latest e-bike company to seek bankruptcy protection after pandemic-era excitement for the category wore off.
articles.author: Sean O'Kane

articles.title: Radiant Nuclear raises $300M for its semi-sized 1 MW reactor
articles.description: Radiant Nuclear is developing a small modular reactor to replace diesel generators. The startup previously raised $165 million in May.
articles.author: Tim De Chant

articles.title: Google launches Gemini 3 Flash, makes it the default model in the Gemini app
articles.description: Google is making Gemini 3 Flash the default model in the Gemini app and oAI model for Search
articles.author: Ivan Mehta

articles.title: Coursera and Udemy enter a merger agreement valued at around $2.5B
articles.description: Coursera and Udemy, two of the biggest names in online learning, are combining platforms next year.
articles.author: Lauren Forristal

articles.title: Bluesky launches a privacy-focused ‘Find Friends’ feature without invite spam
articles.description: The Bluesky contact-matching feature is opt-in and your data won't be used to spam your friends, the social network says.
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: Warner Bros. Discovery rejects Paramount’s hostile bid, calls offer ‘illusory’
articles.description: Warner Bros. Discovery called Paramount's offer "illusory" and said that the company had misled shareholders about its financing.
articles.author: Aisha Malik

articles.title: Mozilla’s new CEO says AI is coming to Firefox, but will remain a choice
articles.description: Mozilla has appointed Anthony Enzor-DeMeo as its CEO as the Firefox developer scrambles to adapt in a rapidly changing browser market.
articles.author: Ram Iyer

articles.title: Google’s vibe-coding tool Opal comes to Gemini
articles.description: The company on Wednesday said it is integrating the tool, which lets you build AI-powered mini apps, inside the Gemini web app, allowing users to
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: Skana Robotics helps fleets of underwater robots communicate with each other
articles.description: Skana Robotics built a decision-making algorithm that helps unmanned vessels react and adapt to data from other vessels.
articles.author: Rebecca Szkutak

articles.title: Amazon reportedly in talks to invest $10B in OpenAI as circular deals stay popular
articles.description: Amazon is in early discussions to invest as much as $10 billion in OpenAI in a deal that would see the AI lab using the e-commerce giant's AI chips.
articles.author: Ivan Mehta

articles.title: Google deepens consumer credit push in India with UPI-linked card
articles.description: Google has entered India's growing co-branded credit card market by partnering with Axis Bank.
articles.author: Jagmeet Singh

articles.title: Weeks after raising $100M, investors pump another $180M into hot Indian startup MoEngage
articles.description: The deal valued MoEngage at "well over" $900 million post-money.
articles.author: Jagmeet Singh

articles.title: Monzo board reportedly pushed out CEO Anil over IPO timing
articles.description: A key issue, reportedly, was IPO timing.
articles.author: Connie Loizos

articles.title: Tesla engaged in deceptive marketing for Autopilot and Full Self-Driving, judge rules
articles.description: The judge ruled Tesla should have to suspend manufacturing and sales in California for 30 days, but the DMV stayed those rulings for 90 days to allow
articles.author: Sean O'Kane
